project_description:
Records email addresses to a Google sheet
Passwords pre defined
Records when it was accessed and how many times by that person
Add a link to book a meeting. 

As a user, I want to be able to share unlisted youtube videos and google doc files or spreadsheets to potential investors without publishing them.

As a user I want to share sentsitive information with investors requiring an email and password to view them. 

As a user I want to have a universal password but log email access in a google sheet including date and time. 

As a developer, I want this to be easily deployable on vercel and database to be managed via google. 

As a user I want to be able to put docs in a folder in google drive and have them appear behind the password login for all users.
